items.sentence: I'm fairly certain that it was an elephant.
I'm afraid that Tom will refuse my request.
I'd like to know what you intend to do now.
I'd like to thank you for your cooperation.
I'd really appreciate a glass of cold beer.
Tom seems to be very upset about something.
Ten to one it'll clear up in an hour or so.
Do you know any Canadians living in Boston?
I won't be able to talk to Tom until later.
I don't think that that's been decided yet.
Raising a dog is like raising a kid, right?
That's the biggest dog that I've ever seen.
If you're hungry, you should eat something.
Tom's dog is on the porch, waiting for Tom.
Tom is reading the book that Mary gave him.
Tom is lucky someone will help him do that.
Tom is the one who designed these costumes.
Tom is the one who came up with the design.
I think that I have enough money to retire.
Tom is the only one who isn't at the party.
Tom drank a swig of water from his canteen.
Tom definitely won't allow Mary to do that.
Tom and Mary want to go to Boston together.
Tom thought Mary was having a heart attack.
Tom wanted to know where Mary was all time.
Tom was supposed to be taking care of Mary.
Tom went back to work as soon as Mary left.
Are we sure there are no snakes in Ireland?
Did you copy and paste this from somewhere?
I wasn't allowed to do the things I wanted.
You've talked about this quite a few times.
The living are more valuable than the dead.
Press the button on the microphone to talk.
I need you to keep doing what you're doing.
No one seemed to be willing to go to sleep.
Tom told me that I could sleep on his sofa.
Tom sleeps in a sleeping bag, even at home.
You'd be crazy to turn down that job offer.
If we have no choice, we'll do it that way.
Do you know where Tom bought these flowers?
It's clear that Tom didn't try hard enough.
I'm a member of the administrative council.
I won't be able to fix it without my tools.
I forgot the code for the safe deposit box.
Leave me alone and don't try to talk to me.
Do you all want to share an orange with me?
This morning, I ran into Tom at the market.
Tom didn't tell us why he wouldn't be here.
Tom saw Mary sitting by herself at the bar.
Do you really think that we should do that?
